attributes.action: Take the power away from religion in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The end of faith schools
The end of tax breaks for religion
Stop allowing religion to take advantage of the young and weak
Stop religion from damaging and interfering with Ethical and scientific issues.
put humanist charities in the same legal position as religious ones.
free speech oppose clauses against harassment on grounds of religion or belief in legislation, as these may lead to unwarranted free speech restrictions via the back door.
Take the title Christian country from the UK.
Separate the state from religion.
